org.zaproxy.zap.network

Class HttpRequestConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.network.HttpRequestConfig

  • public class HttpRequestConfig
extends Object
    A configuration of a HTTP request.

    Allows to configure how the HTTP request is sent, for example, if and how redirects are followed.

    Since:
    2.6.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HttpRequestConfig.Builder
      Builder of HttpRequestConfig.

    • Field Summary

      Constant that indicates that no value was set (thus using the value defined by the sender implementation).

    • Method Detail

      • isFollowRedirects

        public boolean isFollowRedirects()
        Tells whether or not the redirects should be followed.

        Default value: false.

        Returns:
        true if the redirects should be followed, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getRedirectionValidator()

      • getRedirectionValidator

        public HttpRedirectionValidator getRedirectionValidator()
        Gets the HttpRedirectionValidator, to validate the followed redirections.

        Default value: DefaultHttpRedirectionValidator.INSTANCE.

        Returns:
        the validator responsible for validation of redirections, never null.
        See Also:
        isFollowRedirects()

      • isNotifyListeners

        public boolean isNotifyListeners()
        Tells whether or not HttpSenderListeners should be notified before sending the request and after receiving the response.

        Default value: true.

        Returns:
        true if the listeners should be notified, false otherwise.
        Since:
        2.7.0

      • getSoTimeout

        public int getSoTimeout()
        Gets the socket timeout, in milliseconds, when sending the requests.

        Default value: NO_VALUE_SET.

        Returns:
        the socket timeout, in milliseconds.
        Since:
        2.7.0

      • builder

        public static HttpRequestConfig.Builder builder()
        Gets a new HTTP request configuration builder.
        Returns:
        a new HTTP request configuration builder.

      • builder

        public static HttpRequestConfig.Builder builder(HttpRequestConfig configuration)
        Gets a new HTTP request configuration builder, using the following configuration as default.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the HTTP request configuration for defaults.
        Returns:
        a new HTTP request configuration builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given parameter is null.
